name: Abhimanyu Saxena
job_description: As a Co-Founder, Abhimanyu oversees the entire organization, provides strategic direction, ensures long-term goals are aligned across departments, and maintains the company’s vision and operational objectives.
action_items: Oversee all company operations
Define company-wide goals and vision
Make strategic decisions for company growth

subordinates.name: Ashish Chitravanshi
subordinates.job_description: Ashish is responsible for managing cross-functional projects across all departments. He collaborates with department heads to ensure that projects align with company goals and are completed on time.
action_items: Manage cross-functional projects across departments
Collaborate with department heads to align projects with company goals
Ensure timely project delivery and report progress

subordinates.name: Amitoj Singh Kalsi
subordinates.job_description: Amitoj is tasked with analyzing market trends and creating business strategies for enterprise clients. He works closely with sales and marketing teams to implement these strategies.
action_items: Analyze market trends and competitor strategies
Create business strategies for enterprise clients
Collaborate with marketing and sales to implement strategies

subordinates.name: Siddhant Patil
subordinates.job_description: Siddhant develops content strategies for B2B clients. He writes blog posts, case studies, and whitepapers, working with product and marketing teams to ensure alignment.
action_items: Develop content strategies for B2B clients
Write blog posts, case studies, and whitepapers
Work with product and marketing teams for content alignment

subordinates.name: Naman Bhalla
subordinates.job_description: Naman defines the product roadmap and strategies. He works closely with project managers to ensure timely delivery of the product and manages cross-functional teams to ensure product releases are successful.
action_items: Define product roadmap and strategies
Collaborate with project managers to ensure product delivery
Manage cross-functional teams for product releases

subordinates.name: Aashna Dogra
subordinates.job_description: Aashna assists in building AI models for product features and conducts data cleaning and pre-processing tasks. She collaborates with senior engineers to improve the models.
action_items: Assist in building AI models for product features
Conduct data cleaning and pre-processing tasks
Collaborate with senior engineers for model improvements

subordinates.name: Debashis Maharana
subordinates.job_description: Debashis helps develop and test machine learning models and assists in research and development. He contributes to AI documentation and model reporting.
action_items: Develop and test machine learning models
Assist with research and development of AI technologies
Contribute to AI documentation and model reporting

subordinates.name: Ankit Mishra
subordinates.job_description: Ankit advocates for AI and machine learning products by creating content that promotes them. He engages with developer communities, gathers feedback, and maintains documentation and tutorials.
action_items: Create content to promote AI and machine learning products
Engage with developer communities to gather feedback
Create and maintain documentation and tutorials

subordinates.name: Prakhar Shukla
subordinates.job_role: DSML Problem Setter & Content Reviewer Intern
subordinates.job_description: Prakhar works as a problem setter and content reviewer intern for the DSML team. He helps create and review technical problems and solutions for the DSML platform.
action_items: Assist in creating technical problems for DSML platform
Review and test solutions for consistency and difficulty
Provide feedback on problem clarity and relevance

subordinates.name: Gautam Sarawagi
subordinates.job_description: Gautam works as a content reviewer intern. He helps in developing new coding problems, conducts research, and reviews student-submitted solutions for accuracy.
action_items: Help in developing new problems for coding challenges
Conduct research on various DSA topics to create content
Review solutions submitted by students for errors

subordinates.name: Ritika Bera
subordinates.job_role: Problem Setter & Technical Content Creator Intern
subordinates.job_description: Ritika assists in the creation of technical problems and content. She works with senior team members to improve educational content and prepares materials for technical workshops.
action_items: Create detailed solutions for coding problems
Work with senior team members to improve educational content
Assist in preparing the material for technical workshops
